QuestData.Title: Return to the Den
QuestData.Description:
There may be a way to break the curse and free your friend's mind, but it will require some work.
Ulfar was wise to send you to me. He knew that a portion of Gorak Tul's power would be necessary, but the other reagents we need do not exist on Azeroth.
My den is not far from here. Meet me there and I will help you prepare a ritual to break the curse.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Kivarr at her den in Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Kivarr at her den in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: It feels good to be out of that cage and back home in my den.
